short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Legacy Wallet as a web extension for your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Legacy Wallet is a non-custodial multi-chain crypto wallet and part of the Legacy Network ecosystem. You can store, send, and receive your favorite cryptos securely and easily. Your keys are locally encrypted which means that you and only you are in full control of your assets. Our newly thought user interface allows for an easy navigation between the different functions and NFTs can be displayed in a new, amazing way. 

ONE SOLUTION
Manage the most popular cryptos and your favorite collectibles in just one place. The Legacy Wallet supports all coins and tokens on EVM blockchains such as VeChain, Ethereum, Binance smart chain and Polygon. Tokens and NFTs can be added manually with just one click by inserting the contract address.


SECURITY
Security is one of the biggest aspects in the IT and crypto space. All smart contracts in the wallet are independently audited for optimal security and performance. By storing the keys locally, we give you the control over your cryptos and collectibles back. No one has access except you!

IN FUTURE
The Legacy Wallet is under constant improvement and new updates will be launched on a regular basis. Many exciting features ahead, stay tuned!
